text: Hagi fatgo kavukava'ma nehana zanka'a nagu'afina atrogenora frakino omne'ne. Hanki kema hu'nana kere'ma amage'ma antenka vahe'ma zamagu'ma nevazina hihamuka'amofo agenkea eriama hu'na zamasmi'noe. Hagi tusi'a vahekrerfa mani'nazafi eriama hu'na vagaore kavesi zamofone, kema hu'nana kere'ma otinenka ana zama hu kavukavara eriama hu'na zamasmi'noe.
